author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway will operate Suvidha special train from Chennai Egmore to Tiruchi via main line for the ensuing Mahamaham festival to clear the extra rush of pilgrims. The Chennai Egmore – Tiruchi Suvidha superfast special (Train No. 00649) will leave Chennai Egmore at 10.45 p.m. on February 20 and reach Tiruchi at 6 a.m., the next day. The Tiruchi – Chennai Egmore Suvidha special (Train No. 00650) will leave Tiruchi at 11.50 p.m. on February 22 and reach Chennai Egmore at 7.20 a.m. the next day. The trains will have one AC 2-tier, three AC 3-tier, 10 sleeper class and two luggage-cum-brake van coaches. It will stop at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Tiruppadiripuliyur, Chidambaram, Mayiladuthurai, Kumbakonam and Thanjavur, a press release said.

Advance reservation for the trains will commence on February 11.
title: Special train for Mahamaham
